alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 7:34PM CDT until May 30 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 632 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Rushville to 8 miles southwest of Alliance Airport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Watson Lake, Patterson Lake, Big Hill, Morgan Lake, Billys Lake, Kennedy Lake, Miles Lake, Snow Lake, Wickson Lake, Diamond Lake, Lakeside, Wolf Hill, Herman Lake and Krause Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 45. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
